remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require their use.

note.para: For Category 3a/3b approaches, instrument source selections must be made from separate sources.

placard.para: If Left or Right Flight Director System is inoperative, placard appropriate Flight Director Instrument Source Select switch "L (R) FLT DIR SYS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
If Center Flight Director System is inoperative, placard Center Flight Director System "C FLT DIR SYS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: If Left Flight Director System inoperative, select CENTER on Captain’s Flight Director Source Select switch. If Right Flight Director System inoperative, select CENTER on F/O’s Flight Director Source Select switch.
If Center Flight Director System is inoperative, leave Captain’s Flight Director Instrument Source Select switch in LEFT and F/O’s in RIGHT.
